block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the Penultimate Dodecahedron by Robert Neale. It is a 30 module Kusudama or modular origami ball. I realize I haven't made one in awhile. I hope you enjoy it. Here are the chapter of the video: 00:00 Model Demo 00:10 How to Fold the Penultimate Module 00:50 Time-lapse and Number of Modules to fold 01:03 Assembly 01:09 Assembling Level 1 The Base 02:00 Assembling Level 2 03:19 Assembling Level 3 03:54 Assembling Level 4 the Equator 06:00 Assembling Level 5 08:00 Assembling Level 6 The Cap Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel
